list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an entry recording an amount owed, listed on the left-hand side or column of an account.
(of a bank or other financial organization) remove (an amount of money) from a customer's account, typically as payment for services or goods.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: $ 10.000 đã bị ghi nợ từ tài khoản của họ
